description: Fish and seafood take pride of place on the menu at this restaurant just a few minutes’ drive from the beach. The owner-chef (the second generation since 1973) is happy to advise guests on food and wine choices alike, offering a wide choice of wines from all over Italy and around the world. Welcoming dining room and shady arbour. Gluten-free options available.
